alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 2:00PM EDT until August 21 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT FOR EASTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHWESTERN LICKING COUNTIES... At 200 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Polaris, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Westerville, Delaware, Sunbury, Polaris, Galena, Hartford, Interstate 71 at US Route 36/State Route 37, Alum Creek State Park, Olive Green, Stratford, Kilbourne, Lewis Center and Center Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
